Book of Mormon.name: Godhead
Book of Mormon.passage: The Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost are one.

Book of Mormon.name: Another Topic
Book of Mormon.passage: And now as I said concerning faith...

New Testament.passage: For God so loved the world...

Doctrine and Covenants.passage: And now, after the many testimonies...
